comment: Do not take Prof. Bernal for an online class!! She's unorganized and gives pretty much only busy work. Group projects to complete in a week just aren't feasible online and yet every week, there's a new group project and you can't pick your members. Grades very infrequently and puts too much emphasis on discussion posts. Would never take her again.

Grades make no sense and the assignments often feel demeaning. Nothing but busy work. Ms. Bernal seems nice in class, but in person is very quick to try and find things wrong, and is condescending and rude. You can take her for an easy A, but she has NO manners. None at all.

Professor Bernal's lectures are unfocused and meandering. Her visuals are cluttered and poorly organized. Class assignments are arbitrary and grading is inconsistent. Professor Bernal attempts to reach students with a strong message but her points are buried in a lot of confusion.

This is a horrible professor. She does not really teach the class well enough to the point where you feel that you know it. Her tests are unclear with her questions because you will read it one way and get no points because of how you read it.  She is the least helpful during the project  and tells you information at the last minute.

Do not take Ms. Bernal! She is so disorganized that she fails to teach pertinent information. She "left" teaching for a semester and came back, but is no better than she was before. She is also absolutely NOT helpful. You can ask her a straight forward question and she'll still give you a vague, unhelpful answer if she answers you at all!

Professor Bernal is indeed a nice, very smart lady.  However she is cripplingly disorganized.  I've heard her class is manageable, but DO NOT take her for an online course.  She will leave you out in the cold.Honestly the *class is harder than the material...

Yes, she is quite unorganized, but she realizes it and tries her best to make up for it. She's very nice and tries to help you through in any way she can, the only downfall was that no one had any clue of what was going on during the entire semester. Made it out with an A though, so must've done something right!

I personally enjoy all of Professor Bernal class. She is a great teacher that really know her stuff in Software Developing. Most of the stuff that she teaches actually are being used at my work. Overall, a great professor!
she is not that bad, just pay attention and turn in all assignments, yes a little disorganized but overall she's okay in my book.

Although she is a very nice lady, she isn't the most organized teacher. Expect a lot changes her syllabus. Test aren't hard if you literally write down EVERYTHING she says and put it your cheat-sheet she lets you use. You should pass if you take her.

She is the only professor to teach most of the classes that she has. So you're stuck with her. She is Incomprehensible and scatterbrained. Good Luck. Write down EVERYTHING! Regurgitate it back for the exams. Smile and nod a lot she likes that. Participate in pointless discussions. She grades randomly so brownie points help!

Professor is scatter brained and has no clue what is going on. She has no control over the classroom and students tend to cut up. She cant keep her grades straight and seems to pull them out of thin air. She looks for buzz words on the test that make her happy. She tries to be helpful but rarely makes sense. She reads slides and is boring.
She has no clue what she wants to do in the class. You need to guess what she is talking about or what she wants to do. Don't take her at all. It is a waste if time.

She has no clue what she wants do in the class, you have to guess what she is talking about or what she wants to do. The class is boring and she grades you based of if she likes you or not. Don't take her if you can, it's such waste of time.

She has different style of teaching. She repeats what she says alot. Always lets you have a cheat sheet on the test, Just write alot and pay attention here and there and you will do great on the tests and such.  She loves seeing a lot of writing so write lots and get good grades. You will learn some key points but not much detail.

She did not seem prepared for the class. Voice shakes when she talks. Class was done as she thought of what to do and you felt like you were in elementary school. The good think was it was an easy class!
